name.baseName: Grain ; General bituminous coal ; Drying ; All sizes; NESPS2
粮食 ; 一般烟煤 ; 烘干 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.5

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.5
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及使用一般烟煤对粮食进行烘干，适用于所有规模。该过程实施了多种尾气管理技术，包括排放气体、烟尘、二氧化硫和氮氧化物的管理。农业部门及相关行业对有效管理污染的关切至关重要。诸如布袋过滤器、电袋复合收尘器、文丘里、湿喷洒、离心水膜、喷水塔、静电沉降和多管旋风分离器等技术被用来减少烟尘排放。针对二氧化硫污染，采用了钠碱法、氨法、循环流化床、石灰石/石膏法、氧化镁法、旋转喷雾干燥法和双碱法等技术。这些技术确保了环境法规的遵守，并优化了农业加工效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码05,四级代码0514文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为一般烟煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library face to face the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide, pollution coefficient note for sulfur dioxide pollution coefficient in the form of sulfur content (S%), where Sulfur content (S%) is the sulfur content of the fuel, expressed as a mass percentage. For example, if the sulphur content (S%) of the fuel is 3%, then S=3. The production factor described in the original article is 16 S. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to your own calculations in the notes.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以含硫量(S%)形式表示，其中含硫量(S%)是指燃料硫分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中含硫量(S%)为3%，则S=3原文描述的产污系数为 16S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

The end-of-pipe treatment technology for pollutant indicator soot is /, and its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, and the pollutant indicator as soot, which is matched to the most compatible flow in the LCAflow library, with the pollutant indicator commented as soot, and the coefficient of production commented as the coefficient of production of soot expressed in the form of ash content (A%), where ash content (A%) is the ash content received by the coal combustion. The coal combustion received base ash content, expressed in mass percent. For example, if the ash content of the fuel is 15%, then A = 15 The original production coefficient is 0.47 A. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the notes after self-calculation..The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.47A。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.47A. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘，产污系数备注为烟尘的产污系数以含灰量(A%)形式表示，其中含灰量(A%)是指燃煤收到基灰分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中灰分含量为15%，则A＝15原文描述的产污系数为 0.47A。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Flue dustisBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.6.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.47A。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.47A. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.

污染物指标烟尘的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设施年运行小时数/热风炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为烟尘，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为烟尘，产污系数备注为烟尘的产污系数以含灰量(A%)形式表示，其中含灰量(A%)是指燃煤收到基灰分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中灰分含量为15%，则A＝15原文描述的产污系数为 0.47A。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是氧化镁法，其效率为92.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=脱硫设施年运行小时数/热风炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以含硫量(S%)形式表示，其中含硫量(S%)是指燃料硫分含量，以质量百分数表示。例如燃料中含硫量(S%)为3%，则S=3原文描述的产污系数为 16S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
